data.name: UnoControlGridModel
desc: specifies the standard model of a UnoControlGrid control.
**since**
OOo 3.3

types.name: RowBackgroundColors
desc: specifies the colors to be used as background for data rows.

If this sequence is non-empty, the data rows will be rendered with alternating background colors: Assuming the sequence has n elements, each row will use the background color as specified by its number's remainder modulo n.
If this sequence is empty, all rows will use the same background color as the control as whole.
If this property has a value of VOID, rows will be painted in alternating background colors, every second row having a background color derived from the control's selection color.

properties.name: ActiveSelectionBackgroundColor
desc: specifies the color to be used when drawing the background of selected cells, while the control has the focus.
If this property has a value of VOID, the grid control renderer will use some default color, depending on the control's style settings.

properties.name: ActiveSelectionTextColor
desc: specifies the color to be used when drawing the text of selected cells, while the control has the focus.
If this property has a value of VOID, the grid control renderer will use some default color, depending on the control's style settings.

properties.name: ColumnHeaderHeight
desc: specifies the height of the column header row, if applicable.
The height is specified in application font units - see com.sun.star.util.MeasureUnit.
The value given here is ignored if ShowColumnHeader is FALSE.
If the property is VOID, the grid control shall automatically determine a height which conveniently allows, according to the used font, to display one line of text.

properties.name: ColumnModel
desc: Specifies the XGridColumnModel that is providing the column structure.
You can implement your own instance of XGridColumnModel or use the DefaultGridColumnModel.
The column model is in the ownership of the grid model: When you set a new column model, or dispose the grid model, then the (old) column model is disposed, too.
The default for this property is an empty instance of the DefaultGridColumnModel.

properties.name: FontDescriptor
desc: specifies the font attributes of the text in the control.

properties.name: FontEmphasisMark
desc: specifies the com.sun.star.text.FontEmphasis value of the text in the control.

properties.name: FontRelief
desc: specifies the com.sun.star.text.FontRelief value of the text in the control.

properties.name: GridDataModel
desc: Specifies the XGridDataModel that is providing the hierarchical data.
You can implement your own instance of XGridDataModel or use the DefaultGridDataModel.
The data model is in the ownership of the grid model: When you set a new data model, or dispose the grid model, then the (old) data model is disposed, too.
The default for this property is an empty instance of the DefaultGridDataModel.

properties.name: GridLineColor
desc: specifies the color to be used when drawing lines between cells
If this property has a value of VOID, the grid control renderer will use some default color, depending on the control's style settings.

properties.name: HScroll
desc: Specifies the vertical scrollbar mode.
The default value is FALSE

properties.name: HeaderBackgroundColor
desc: specifies the color to be used when drawing the background of row or column headers
If this property has a value of VOID, the grid control renderer will use some default color, depending on the control's style settings.

properties.name: HeaderTextColor
desc: specifies the color to be used when drawing the text within row or column headers
If this property has a value of VOID, the grid control renderer will use some default color, depending on the control's style settings.

properties.name: HelpText
desc: specifies the help text of the control.

properties.name: HelpURL
desc: specifies the help URL of the control.

properties.name: InactiveSelectionBackgroundColor
desc: specifies the color to be used when drawing the background of selected cells, while the control does not have the focus.
If this property has a value of VOID, the grid control renderer will use some default color, depending on the control's style settings.

properties.name: InactiveSelectionTextColor
desc: specifies the color to be used when drawing the text of selected cells, while the control does not have the focus.
If this property has a value of VOID, the grid control renderer will use some default color, depending on the control's style settings.

properties.name: RowHeaderWidth
desc: specifies the width of the row header column, if applicable.
The width is specified in application font units - see com.sun.star.util.MeasureUnit.
The value given here is ignored if ShowRowHeader is FALSE.

properties.name: RowHeight
desc: Specifies the height of rows in the grid control.
The height is specified in application font units - see com.sun.star.util.MeasureUnit.

properties.name: SelectionModel
desc: Specifies the selection mode that is enabled for this grid control.
The default value is com.sun.star.view.SelectionType.SINGLE

properties.name: ShowColumnHeader
desc: Specifies whether the grid control should display a title row.
The default value is TRUE

properties.name: ShowRowHeader
desc: Specifies whether the grid control should display a special header column.
The default value is FALSE

properties.name: Tabstop
desc: Specifies that the control can be reached with the TAB key.

properties.name: TextColor
desc: specifies the color to be used when drawing cell texts
If this property has a value of VOID, the grid control renderer will use some default color, depending on the control's style settings.

properties.name: TextLineColor
desc: specifies the color to be used when drawing text lines (underlining and strikethrough)
If this property has a value of VOID, the grid control renderer will use some default color, depending on the control's style settings.

properties.name: UseGridLines
desc: controls whether or not to paint horizontal and vertical lines between the grid cells.

properties.name: VScroll
desc: Specifies the horizontal scrollbar mode.
The default value is FALSE

properties.name: VerticalAlign
desc: specifies the vertical alignment of the content in the control.
